ygData.subject: RE: Question:Tinkering skill max? Yeah or Nay?
ygData.msgSnippet: There are a couple of skill caps.  The one for normal casting abilities and such is (5 * level) + 5 which would hit 200 at 39, with this in mind it may be such
ygData.messageBody:
There are a couple of skill caps. The one for normal casting abilities and
such is
(5 * level) + 5 which would hit 200 at 39, with this in mind it may be such
that verant has created several different cap limits.



> -----Original Message-----
> From: sragan@... [mailto:sragan@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, November 03, 1999 10:32 AM
> To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Question:Tinkering skill max? Yeah or Nay?
>
>
> From: sragan@...
>
> Hi Folks,
>
> Ok I've seen the posts where folks say we have a skill max of 5 x
> (level -15). As a 35th level wizzy that would put my skill max at 100.
>
> Are we SURE about this? Why do I see Master Fletchers with a
> skill of 200 that are lower level than I am? Is this max just a
> Tinker thing?
>
> *FizzWizz quotes her mantra* , "Verant Bastards!".
>
> Can someone confirm this for me? Its going to be hell getting
> thru 35, and it may be a while before I'm 36 =( I would hate to
> think my tinkering is dependent on killing more lizzys in Cazic.
>
> Cheers,
>
> "FizzWizz" of tunare
>
>
